text:
Il se redressa enfin, se massa la cou tout en prenant le temps de rouvrir les yeux, d'observer son environnement. La veille il n'avait pas eu l'occasion de bien regarder. [redacted_name] l'avait invité à dormir à demi-mots, lui ayant surtout sous-entendu de rester à travers un "A cette heure, il n'y a plus de train" ce qui n'était pas totalement faux. [redacted_name] aurait tout aussi bien pu rentrer à pied ou prendre un taxi, mais ça avait parut évident qu'il passerait la nuit avec son capitaine, pour lui tenir compagnie, lui montrer qu'il serait toujours là pour lui.
La mise en place du matelas avait été laborieuse. [redacted_name] s'était refusé à allumer les lumières pour ne pas réveiller sa mère, tout avait dû se faire dans le silence, et c'est à coup d'éclairages via leurs téléphones que les adolescents s'étaient repéré.
Et à présent [redacted_name] était encore là, au petit matin, dans la chambre de son coéquipier.
trans:
He finally sat up, massaged his neck and took the time to open his eyes again, to observe his surroundings. The day before he hadn't had a chance to take a good look. [redacted_name] had half-heartedly invited him to sleep, implying above all that he should stay over with a ‘At this time of day, there are no more trains’, which wasn't totally wrong. [redacted_name] could just as easily have walked home or taken a taxi, but it seemed obvious that he would spend the night with his captain, to keep him company, to show him that he would always be there for him.
Putting the mattress in place had been painstaking. [redacted_name] had refused to turn on the lights so as not to wake his mother, so everything had had to be done in silence, and it was by flashing lights on their phones that the teenagers had found each other.
And now [redacted_name] was still there, at dawn, in his team-mate's bedroom.
